group_1.narration: <Once, there were two sisters who became thralls@after their clan was murdered.>
<Their names were Olga…>
<...and Gunhild.>
<A miracle occured that transformed their lives@when the warrior Ebbe, once saved by their father,@freed them from their status as thralls,@and the girls took leadership of his warrior band.>
<But...there was more to this miracle@than it seemed.>
<This entire series of events occurred@in exchange for Gunhild contracting@with Kyubey to become a Magical Girl.>
<The contract tore a rift between@the once-close sisters.>
<Meanwhile, the Magical Girls from the future@who had the sisters under observation...>
<...were on an important mission@to retrieve Iroha's concept.>

<In order to ensure they would not@influence the course of history,@ Yuna and her friends avoided direct@contact with Olga and Gunhild,@but are pained to see how the two sisters' love@for each other has caused them to be at odds.>
<And that was when Olga and her warrior band@received a message…>
"King Harald the Third…"
"The man who would come to be known@as the Hard Ruler."
"He was an ambitious man who,@after much struggle, took Norway's throne,@and aimed to seize Denmark as well."
"He was unable to conquer Denmark, however,@despite many years of military success@in his invasion."
"During this time,@as Harald's offense was flagging,@the former Count of Northumbria,@Tostig Godwinson, entered the scene."
"He was the brother of Harold Godwinson,@who became the King of England,@but objected to his brother's coronation."
"And...he offered Harald the conquest of England."
"Harald took up his proposal@and planned a massive campaign…"
"He is in the midst of preparations as we speak."

group_1.textRight: I've heard that Harald is very strong.
He lost the battle for the Norwegian throne@when he was young,
but came to be known as an excellent general@in Kiev and Byzantium after his exile.
Harald is sure to win England…

group_1.textLeft: But that's no reason for us to join…

group_1.textRight: While we may be a low-ranking group, if we@take part and accomplish great feats...
We'll surely be taken into Harald's fold…
And then we'll become more powerful@than we are now…!
And that means we'll have more freedom!
Your dream is coming true, Olga!
